title: Retail Forecasting Audit
description: Analyzed sales data for a retail chain to improve forecasting accuracy.
what_we_did: Increased forecast accuracy by 25% and reduced stockouts.,Conducted data audit, built adaptive models, and implemented regime-based forecasting.

title: Business Intelligence System for SME
description: Developed a BI system for a small business to monitor performance.
results: Boosted decision-making speed by 40% and revenue by 15%.,Designed custom dashboards, integrated data sources, and trained staff.

title: Statistical Consulting for Research
description: Provided consulting for academic research on market trends.
results: Published paper with robust statistical analysis.
what_we_did: Analyzed datasets, designed experiments, and reviewed methodologies.
